statements: UPDATE clinical_trial_data SET dosage_amount = 150 WHERE trial_id = 1;
UPDATE clinical_trial_data SET trial_result = 'Positive', trial_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE patient_id = 10;
UPDATE clinical_trial_data SET trial_result='Success', dosage_amount=100 WHERE trial_id=1;

UPDATE clinical_trial_data SET dosage = 50.0, efficacy_score = 0.8 WHERE trial_id = 1;
UPDATE machine_learning_algorithm SET model_filename = 'new_model.pkl', algorithm_name = 'SVM' WHERE algorithm_id = 3;
UPDATE clinical_trial_data SET dosage = 15.5, efficacy_score = 0.85 WHERE patient_id = 101 AND drug_id = 201;
UPDATE machine_learning_algorithm SET training_data = 'data.csv', model_filename = 'model_v1.mdl' WHERE algorithm_id = 3;
UPDATE clinical_trials SET efficacy_score = 8.5 WHERE patient_id = 101 AND drug_name = 'DrugA';
UPDATE patient_data SET weight = 70.2, age = 35 WHERE patient_id = 201;
UPDATE clinical_trials SET efficacy_score = 8.5, drug_name = 'New Drug' WHERE trial_id = 101;
UPDATE patient_data SET age = 40, gender = 'Male', weight = 75.5 WHERE patient_id = 201;
UPDATE trials SET dosage = 10.5, outcome = 'Successful' WHERE trial_id = 1;
UPDATE patients SET gender = 'Female', age = 30 WHERE patient_id = 3;
UPDATE trials SET dosage = 10.5, trial_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE trial_id = 101;
UPDATE patients SET age = 30, medical_history = 'No significant medical history' WHERE patient_id = 201;
UPDATE clinical_trial_data SET gender='Male' WHERE trial_id=1;
